text:
@realDonaldTrump The bloated buffoon just claimed that he saved millions of lives from the coronavirus.

Thank God we have him for comic relief since we can’t watch the great Saturday Night Live every week right now.

He’s a walking skit

Back to reality...
He killed 120,000+ people
